00055 void CHPFileReaderTest::ReadCHPExpressionFileTest()
00056 {
00057         CHPData data;
00058         CHPFileReader reader;
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_expression_file"));
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00061 
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_expression_file");
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 10);
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetBackgroundZoneCnt() == 2);
00065 
00066         CHPExpressionEntry entry1;
00067         data.GetEntry(0, entry1);
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetProbeSetName() == "probe set 1");
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetDetection() == 10);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetDetectionPValue() == 11.0f);
00071         float signal = entry1.GetSignal();
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(signal == 17.8f);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetNumPairs() == 6);
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetNumPairsUsed() == 5);
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetChange() == 2);
00076         float chgPVal = entry1.GetChangePValue();
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(chgPVal == 56.9f);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetSigLogRatio() == 45.89f);
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetSigLogRatioLo() == 42.0f);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetSigLogRatioHi() == 47.0f);
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetCommonPairs() == 2);
00082 
00083         CHPExpressionEntry entry2;
00084         data.GetEntry(1, entry2);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetProbeSetName() == "probe set 2");
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetDetection() == 10);
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetDetectionPValue() == 1.0f);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetSignal() == 7.8f);
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetNumPairs() == 6);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetNumPairsUsed() == 5);
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetChange() == 2);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetChangePValue() == 5.9f);
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetSigLogRatio() == 4.89f);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetSigLogRatioLo() == 2.0f);
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetSigLogRatioHi() == 7.0f);
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetCommonPairs() == 2);
00097 
00098         CHPBackgroundZone zone1;
00099         data.GetBackgroundZone(0, zone1);
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterX() == 11.0f);
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterY() == 17.8f);
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetBackground() == 56.9f);
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetSmoothFactor() == 45.89f);
00104 
00105         CHPBackgroundZone zone2;
00106         data.GetBackgroundZone(1, zone2);
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterX() == 1.0f);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterY() == 7.8f);
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetBackground() == 6.9f);
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetSmoothFactor() == 5.89f);
00111 }
00112 
00113 void CHPFileReaderTest::ReadCHPGenotypingFileTest()
00114 {
00115         CHPData data;
00116         CHPFileReader reader;
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_genotype_file"));
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00119 
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_genotype_file");
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 2);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetBackgroundZoneCnt() == 2);
00123 
00124         CHPGenotypeEntry entry1;
00125         data.GetEntry(0, entry1);
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetProbeSetName() == "probe set 1");
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetCall() == 1);
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetConfidence() == 11.0f);
00129         float ras1 = entry1.GetRAS1();
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ras1 == 17.8f);
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetRAS2() == 6.0f);
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetAACall() == 5.0f);
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetABCall() == 2.0f);
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetBBCall() == 56.9f);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetNoCall() == 45.89f);
00136 
00137         CHPGenotypeEntry entry2;
00138         data.GetEntry(1, entry2);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetProbeSetName() == "probe set 2");
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetCall() == 2);
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetConfidence() == 1.0f);
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetRAS1() == 7.8f);
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetRAS2() == 6.0f);
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetAACall() == 5.0f);
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetABCall() == 2.0f);
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetBBCall() == 5.9f);
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetNoCall() == 4.8f);
00148 
00149         CHPBackgroundZone zone1;
00150         data.GetBackgroundZone(0, zone1);
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterX() == 11.0f);
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterY() == 17.8f);
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetBackground() == 56.9f);
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetSmoothFactor() == 45.89f);
00155 
00156         CHPBackgroundZone zone2;
00157         data.GetBackgroundZone(1, zone2);
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterX() == 1.0f);
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterY() == 7.8f);
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetBackground() == 6.9f);
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetSmoothFactor() == 5.89f);
00162 }

00164 void CHPFileReaderTest::ReadCHPUniversalFileTest()
00165 {
00166         CHPData data;
00167         CHPFileReader reader;
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_universal_file"));
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00170 
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_universal_file");
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 2);
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetBackgroundZoneCnt() == 2);
00174 
00175         CHPUniversalEntry entry1;
00176         data.GetEntry(0, entry1);
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetBackground() == 11.0f);
00178 
00179         CHPUniversalEntry entry2;
00180         data.GetEntry(1, entry2);
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetBackground() == 1.0f);
00182 
00183         CHPBackgroundZone zone1;
00184         data.GetBackgroundZone(0, zone1);
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterX() == 11.0f);
00186         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterY() == 17.8f);
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetBackground() == 56.9f);
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetSmoothFactor() == 45.89f);
00189 
00190         CHPBackgroundZone zone2;
00191         data.GetBackgroundZone(1, zone2);
00192         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterX() == 1.0f);
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterY() == 7.8f);
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetBackground() == 6.9f);
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetSmoothFactor() == 5.89f);
00196 }

00198 void CHPFileReaderTest::ReadCHPReseqFileTest()
00199 {
00200         CHPData data;
00201         CHPFileReader reader;
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_reseq_file"));
00203         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00204 
00205         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_reseq_file");
00206 
00207         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 5);
00208         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetBackgroundZoneCnt() == 1);
00209         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetForceCnt() == 2);
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOrigCnt() == 3);
00211 
00212         const double eps = 1e-5;
00213         CHPReseqEntry e;
00214         data.GetEntry(0, e);
00215         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 'a');
00216         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 1.0f, eps);
00217 
00218         data.GetEntry(1, e);
00219         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 'c');
00220         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 2.0f, eps);
00221 
00222         data.GetEntry(2, e);
00223         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 'g');
00224         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 3.0f, eps);
00225 
00226         data.GetEntry(3, e);
00227         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 't');
00228         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 4.0f, eps);
00229 
00230         data.GetEntry(4, e);
00231         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 'n');
00232         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 5.0f, eps);
00233 
00234         CHPReseqForceCall force;
00235         data.GetForceCall(0, force);
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.position == 1);
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.call == 'a');
00238         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.reason == CC_SATURATION_LEVEL_FORCE_CALL);
00239 
00240         data.GetForceCall(1, force);
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.position == 2);
00242         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.call == 'c');
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.reason == CC_WEAK_SIGNAL_THR_FORCE_CALL);
00244 
00245         CHPReseqOrigCall orig;
00246         data.GetOrigCall(0, orig);
00247         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.position == 3);
00248         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.call == 't');
00249 
00250         data.GetOrigCall(1, orig);
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.position == 4);
00252         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.call == 'a');
00253 
00254         data.GetOrigCall(2, orig);
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.position == 5);
00256         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.call == 'g');
00257 
00258 }
